title: Update MT5 account details
description: This call update user details in MT5 system

name.description: Client's name. The maximum length of a client's symbol name is 128 characters. Optional field.

address.description: The address of the user. The maximum length of the address is 128 characters. Optional field.

state.description: User's state (region) of residence. Optional field.

city.description: User's city of residence. Optional field.

country.description: 2-letter country code (value received from residence_list call)

company.description: Name of the client's company. The maximum length of the company name is 64 characters. Optional field.

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: Optional field to map request to response
